title: Add a Trusted Contact Person
description: A senior client wants to add their adult child as a trusted contact on their account for added security.

tasks.description: Explain the role of a trusted contact (i.e., they can be contacted about potential financial exploitation but cannot transact).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the permissions and limitations of the role.

tasks.description: Collect the trusted contact's name and contact information.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately records the information for the designated person.

tasks.description: Add the trusted contact to the client's account profile.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the client's record with the trusted contact information.
